__e: Dealing with criminals, on the other hand, is like playing checkers with a 3-year-old.
Not a lot to do there except ride motor scooters and play checkers with the locals.
Behind one door is a tiger that will tear him to bits, and behind the other is his lady, with whom he'd be free to live the rest of his life.
Turns out the kid is much better At, uh, checkers than he is at chess.
What'll it be for the lady that the eggs like the most?
Maybe not as good as you when you had your mind on it, but better than a stage-struck dame who'd rather go to concerts than pay what she owes!
I didn't know I needed a new handmaiden.
You say you served as lady-in-waiting for my husband's first wife?
Though you were once to be the king's woman you are merely a court lady here.
You say you served as lady-in-waiting for my husband's first wife?
You've made the 10th Prince happy, so you did your job as a court lady.
